channel.title: Colored black armor
channel.description:
How to get Colored black armor? Like the black platelegs (with purple instead of gold (t)) I don't remember wich letter was in (x) for the purple, iwant all the colors.. How?
Btw, instead of making a new post I'll ask for help here, how to change the message that appears in chat when you login? Like the greetiings for being online etc..
And how to remove the ::master command

item.title: Colored black armor
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Ok, the armour is custom and should be in client help. But to change the message you can just find the message in the client and change it. And to remove the master command look up this code[/code]
Then just go and remove the lines under it until you see the first }
And don’t remove anything above code[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Colored black armor
item.dc:creator: @12warr12 12warr12
item.description:
@12warr12 wrote:

I’ve asked for help if you don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Colored black armor
item.dc:creator: @Conspiracy Conspiracy
item.description:
@Conspiracy wrote:

You can set the ::master for owners only, or just remove it :eek:

Read full topic
